summary: This mod adds chainmail to the vanilla Steel Plate Armor.
descriptionHtml:
This mod replaces the texture with a texture that changes the cloth segments to a chainmail texture.
To install just extract all files to your Skyrim Data folder, after that start Skyrim and enable the mod in the load order.

There is also  a Standalone version of the armor that adds a new set of the armor and does not alter the vanilla.
Side by side
Left: Plate Mail Right: Vanilla

Check out another of my Plate retextures
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80266/?]Darker Steel Plate Retexture

Follow me on Twitter @DankFrenchToast
